title: Bkash
description: Bangladesh's leading mobile financial service platform. Send and receive money instantly nationwide. Pay utility bills including electricity and gas. Mobile recharge for all operators. Cash out from any agent point across country. Make secure merchant payments at shops. Open savings account with interest. Apply for micro loans and insurance. Send money to bank accounts directly. Pay for online shopping and services. Use for educational institution fees. Government social security payments. Salary disbursement for organizations. Donate to charities and organizations. 24/7 customer support available. User-friendly Bengali interface. High security with PIN protection. Transaction history and statements. Available in both urban and rural areas. Trusted by over 50 million users
